column1: Little Goat Diner////The Meh ... well I should start by saying I'm not the biggest fan of fusion food. And going into this meal
column2: I didn't know that the little goat diner was going to be all fusion-y. So
column3: especially when I'm hungry and just want diner style simple foods
column4: this did not hit any spots. This also might be why I was in love with the breads that we started with. But I felt like most fusion food
column5: it just tried too hard to be cool. I only had breakfast foods
column6: so maybe the lunch items are better? But what they called kimchee was korean hot pepper paste. Whatever they called hosin sauce was cut too much with rice vinegar that it lost any of the sweet hosin taste.
